etri.sdn.controller.app.simple

Class SimpleOFController

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.OFController
      • etri.sdn.controller.app.simple.SimpleOFController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    etri.sdn.controller.protocol.io.IOFHandler, java.lang.Comparable<etri.sdn.controller.protocol.io.IOFHandler>

    public class SimpleOFController
extends etri.sdn.controller.OFController

    This is a simple OF controller which is mainly used for demonstration. This controller allows all kind of packets to go to their destinations using the OFMLearningMac module.

    The other modules are included to test their basic operations. With this controller, you can check all the basic functionalities of IRIS are fully up and operational.

    Author:
    bjlee

      • handleGeneric

        public boolean handleGeneric(etri.sdn.controller.protocol.io.Connection conn,
                    etri.sdn.controller.MessageContext context,
                    org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)

        This accepts all OFMessage objects other than PACKET_IN. By tweaking this implementation, you can adjust how the messages are processes.

        By default, PORT_STATUS and FEATURES_REPLY messages are passed only to OFMLinkDiscovery module. Other messages are not handled.

        Specified by:
        handleGeneric in class etri.sdn.controller.OFController
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection object to a switch.
        context - MessageContext object which is created per every OFMessage object.
        m - OFMessage object
